title: New: Battle Ground Grammar – Knew Back Then
body:
[**Battle Ground Grammar**](https://www.facebook.com/BattleGroundGrammar) is Seattle musician, producer and songwriter Andrew Gospe. Back in October, he quietly dropped his debut EP _BGG_, a collection of tracks that moved with ease between groovy UK/garage vibes and soulful down-tempo serenades. The real surprise, though, came with the vagabond boogie anthem ‘Knew Back Then’, a wicked R&B sampledelia of pitched down vocals and tribal percussion that nurtures an unexpected dance floor sensitivity inside its crazy rhythm.

**BGG** is available for free download [over here](http://battlegroundgrammar.bandcamp.com/).

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/110747205″ params=”color=ff6600&auto\_play=false&show\_artwork=true” width=”100%” height=”166″ iframe=”true” /\]
